波动率数据接口¶

Description: This script aims to fetch market data stored in MongoDB

  1. fetch market data stored in database

  2. given ttm rule, calculate implied volatility

  3. from the corresponding implied volatility, fit svi

__init__(self, date, underlying_code, exchange_name)¶
参数:

  • date (str) – “yyyymmdd”

  • underlying_code (str) – underlying code

  • exchange_name (str) – exchange name

get_volatility(self, rf, ttm_rule, total_trading_days=244.0, export_data=False)¶
参数:

  • rf (float) – risk free rate

  • ttm_rule (str) – ‘calendar_day’ or ‘trading_day’

  • total_trading_days (float) – specify total trading days in a year

  • export_data (bool) – choose whether to export volatility data

返回:

iv_table, svi_table

返回类型:

pandas.DataFrame

VolSurface
